snippet: Terry Tang, whose career at The New York Times has included stints on the metropolitan, business and editorial desks, has been named deputy editorial page editor.
abstract: The New York Times names Terry Tang deputy editorial page editor.
lead_paragraph: Terry Tang, whose career at The New York Times has included stints on the metropolitan, business and editorial desks, has been named deputy editorial page editor.

headline.seo: Terry Tang Is Named Deputy Editorial Page Editor at The Times
headline.main: Editorial Page Promotion at The Times
headline.print_headline: Editorial Page Promotion At The Times
